mapper.insert: insert into mall_cart(cartId, memberrId, bookId, bookCount) values(mall_cart_seq.NEXTVAL, #{memberrId}, #{bookId}, #{bookCount})
mapper.update: update mall_cart set bookCount=#{bookCount} where cartId = #{cartId}
mapper.select: select * from mall_cart where memberrId = #{memberrId} and bookId = #{bookId}
mapper.delete: delete from mall_cart where memberrId = #{memberrId} and bookId = #{bookId}
